headline: Best Buy Appoints Dylan Jadeja to Board of Directors
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 01, 2025--Best Buy Co., Inc. has appointed Dylan Jadeja, the chief executive officer of Riot Games, to its Board of Directors, effective immediately.
